email_response.subject: Re: OPPORTUNITY: Satellite Upgrade technicians needed in Atlanta
email_response.body:
Hi,

This sounds like a great opportunity! I'm definitely interested.

I've got all the equipment you need:
- Bucket truck - Ford F-750 with 50ft reach
- Spectrum analyzer - Rohde & Schwarz FSH8
- Cable tester - Fluke DTX-1800

I'm available to travel throughout the Atlanta metro area and beyond. I've been in the satellite installation business for 5 years and have done numerous upgrade projects.

I'm ready to get started whenever you need me. Just let me know the schedule and I'll make it work.

Mike Davis
Network Pros Inc.
(770) 555-0342
